sections.title: SRE Advisory & Strategy
sections.description: Assess current systems, automation, and operational workflows to define a roadmap for adopting SRE practices tailored to your organization.
offerings: Evaluate existing infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and monitoring setup.
Define SLOs (Service Level Objectives) and SLIs (Service Level Indicators).
Design and implement error budgets and policies.
Recommend industry-standard SRE practices to improve system reliability.

sections.title: Automated SDLC & Infrastructure Management
sections.description: Enable faster development and delivery by automating infrastructure and application deployment across multi-cloud and hybrid environments.
offerings: Implement CI/CD pipelines to streamline application delivery.
Adopt progressive delivery for cloud-native applications.
Manage Kubernetes and container orchestration, including auto-scaling, configuration management, and deployment patterns.

sections.title: Observability & Monitoring
sections.description: Establish end-to-end observability to proactively identify issues and optimize system performance.
offerings: Implement monitoring and health checks across infrastructure and applications.
Generate actionable metrics and insights to improve reliability.

sections.title: Incident Management & Remediation
sections.description: Create robust processes for on-call support, emergency troubleshooting, and maintaining operational runbooks.
offerings: Conduct detailed post-mortems to prevent recurrence of production issues.

sections.title: Disaster Recovery & Resilience Testing
sections.description: Ensure business continuity with automated disaster recovery and resilience testing for containerized applications.
offerings: Design and execute chaos engineering experiments to validate production system resilience.

sections.title: Security, Governance & Cost Management
sections.description: Protect systems, maintain compliance, and optimize operational costs in cloud and hybrid environments.
offerings: Conduct security audits and remediate vulnerabilities.
Implement capacity planning and rightsizing for optimized performance.
Monitor and control infrastructure costs effectively.

sections.title: SRE Training & Knowledge Transfer
sections.description: Empower your teams with hands-on SRE training, enabling them to implement and maintain reliability best practices.
offerings: Train teams on SRE principles and their integration with DevOps.
Create training documentation and knowledge bases for continuous learning.
